name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Caption: 1. The scene of the hunger strike of 3,000 college students. 2. Students on hunger strike wrote their thoughts on the hunger strike on the back of their clothes. 3. As of the evening of the 14th, the hunger strike had lasted 28 hours. 4. Gu Weimin, a college student on hunger strike, looked determined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As Putin and Xi Jinping will attend the Harbin International Trade Fair, schools in Harbin have issued a notice to remind parents to tell their children not to post sensitive words on social media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, teachers and students from a music classroom performed "Another Brick in the Wall", one of the representative works of the famous rock band Pink Floyd, on the streets of Leshan, Sichuan.
"Another Brick in the Wall" is a song that criticizes the rigid and indoctrination-style education system. It expresses that under a specific system, people's personalities are erased, and they are transformed from living individuals into bricks in the wall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 16, Hefei, Anhui. Anhui University Jianghuai College built a new school in the name of transfer, did not recognize the teachers' work records and students' enrollment, the school embezzled 6,000 yuan of students' transfer subsidies, and the school accommodation environment was poor. On that day, students held banners to defend their rights and seek justice. During the period, several unidentified people blocked the school gate and prevented students from going out. 
Another student revealed that the school threatened students with water and power outages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 16, Henan. The Pengyu Jinyuefu real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners beat a pig's head outside the sales office to vent their anger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 14, in Dezhou, Shandong, an Ideal car owner reported that a week after picking up the car, there was a strange sound of leakage in the car. He tried to defend his rights many times but to no avail. The manufacturer said that there was a problem with the entertainment module in the car, and that it was impossible to return or exchange it, but could provide 2,000 yuan of care expenses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students at the scene shouted in unison: "An Da is unscrupulous" and "Return the money!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to insiders, the party secretary of Anhui University is still hiding in the conference room and has not come out. The teachers have negotiated with the leaders many times before, but to no avail. Today, the school cut off the water and electricity in the dormitories. In the afternoon, plainclothes police officers blocked the school gate to prevent students from entering or leaving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 15, in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, the owners of Shuxiang Courtyard came to the county government to defend their rights regarding the heating and delayed delivery of their houses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 15, in Wenshui County, Shanxi Province, it was reported online that a local mortgage company rented hundreds of cars from multiple car dealerships and used them as collateral, but then collapsed, leaving the car owners unable to take their cars out of the warehouse. That night, a large number of car owners went to the scene to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 16, Beijing. People from all over the country gathered outside the Supreme Court to seek justice. Everyone was shouting about their grievances.
The person who filmed the video was from Heilongjiang. His store was smashed, and the police refused to file a case, so he came to Beijing to defend his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 16, Wuhan, Hubei. The new primary school project in Guanshidun area owed workers wages, and workers held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 15, Sina Weibo announced that a user was banned for posting content that exaggerated the “struggle of the lower classes to survive” and maliciously hyped up class confrontation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 15th, Woyang, Anhui. HSBC Credit and Silian Guarantee both collapsed at the same time. A large number of victims went to the county government to defend their rights. During the period, many people were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported online that employees of Suzhou Baixiao Medical Technology Co., Ltd. stated that the company had allowed employees to take voluntary leave since last year, suspected of being under management. Now, in order to evade dismissal compensation, the company slandered the employees, saying they had "hired thugs, beaten, intimidated, and threatened" and so on, thereby forcibly terminating their labor contracts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 16, netizens from Leiyang, Hunan shouted to Putin: Peace-loving Chinese people do not welcome war criminals!
